entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
